images.prompt: A romantic Brazilian-themed setting for Dia dos Namorados, featuring a lush green background with vibrant red roses and candles placed on a wooden table, surrounded by twinkling fairy lights and a subtle sunset glow in the background, with a few scattered love notes and heart-shaped balloons in the foreground, all in a warm, golden light.

A serene and idyllic Brazilian beach scene at sunset, capturing the warm, golden light of the setting sun casting a golden glow on the sandy shore, with a few palm trees swaying gently in the breeze, a few beach towels and a cooler basket scattered on the sand, and a romantic couple embracing in the distance, with the vast ocean stretching out to the horizon, all in a soft, pastel color palette.

response.description: Two romantic Brazilian-themed images celebrating Dia dos Namorados, featuring lush greenery, vibrant flowers, twinkling lights, and serene beach scenes, all in warm, golden light.
